      • addUser

        protected void addUser(User u)
                throws InvalidFieldException
        Adds a contestant, resorts the table. Updates the stored game data.
        Parameters:
        c -
        Throws:
        InvalidFieldException - Thrown if ID is already in use

      • removeUser

        protected void removeUser(User u)

      • updateUser

        protected void updateUser(User u)
                   throws InvalidFieldException
        Updates the stored contestant with the same ID to hold the currently stored information. Overwrites everything in the current position, also will resort the data table.
        If the ID is not present, it WILL create a new entry.
        Parameters:
        c - New contestant data.
        Throws:
        InvalidFieldException - Thrown if ID in use on a new contestant
